text: The krone (, abbreviation: kr (also NKr for distinction); code: NOK), plural kroner, is the currency of the Kingdom of Norway. The krone was the thirteenth-most-traded currency in the world.Bank for International Settlements: Triennial Central Bank Survey p. 12 ==References== ==Other websites== * Factors that influence the krone exchange rate , information from Norges Bank in 2000. * The banknotes of Norway * Official exchange rates in Norway Category:Currency of Europe Category:Norway
title: Norwegian krone
